## Installation Steps

1. **Install Dependencies**:
   Install the required dependencies using npm:

   ```bash
   npm install framer-motion
   ```

2. **Copy this Component**

```typescript:TrustedBySection.tsx showLineNumbers

const containerVariants = {
  visible: {
    transition: {
      delayChildren: 0.5,
      staggerChildren: 0.5,
    },
  },
  hidden: {
    transition: {
      delayChildren: 0.5,
      staggerChildren: 0.5,
    },
  },
};

const childrenVariants = {
  visible: {
    opacity: 1,
    y: 0,
    filter: "blur(0px)",
    transition: {
      duration: 0.5,
      ease: "easeInOut",
    },
  },
  hidden: {
    opacity: 0,
    y: 10,
    filter: "blur(3px)",
    transition: {
      duration: 0.5,
      ease: "easeInOut",
    },
  },
};

const TrustedBySection = (): JSX.Element => {
  return (
    <motion.section
      className="w-full max-w-7xl mx-auto py-12 text-center"
      variants={containerVariants}
      animate="visible"
      initial="hidden"
    >
      <motion.h2
        className="text-sm tracking-tight uppercase text-muted-foreground font-semibold px-4"
        variants={{
          visible: {
            y: 0,
            filter: "blur(0px)",
            opacity: 1,
          },
          hidden: {
            y: 5,
            filter: "blur(3px)",
            opacity: 0,
          },
        }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.5, ease: "easeInOut" }}
      >
        Trusted by the best in the industry
      </motion.h2>
      <motion.div className="h-full mt-8 pb-6 flex flex-wrap gap-x-8 gap-y-6 items-center justify-center px-12 [mask:radial-gradient(ellipse_at_center,hsl(var(--foreground))_-10%,transparent_150%)]">
        {logos.map((logo, index) => (
          <motion.div
            key={index}
            className="[&_path]:fill-black dark:[&_path]:fill-white dark:brightness-0 dark:invert [&_svg]:w-28 [&_svg]:h-8"
            variants={childrenVariants}
          >
            {logo}
          </motion.div>
        ))}
      </motion.div>
    </motion.section>
  );
};

export default TrustedBySection;
```
